mapper.select:
SELECT ZGF.GROUP_ID AS RECEIVER, ZGF.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID, ZGF.FILE_NAME||decode(nvl(ZGF.FILE_EXT,'null'),'null','','.'||ZGF.FILE_EXT) as FILE_NAME, ZGF.LEVELS AS LEVELS, ZGF.CREATOR AS REVISER, ZGF.CREATOR_NAME AS REVISERNAME, TO_CHAR(ZGF.CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TIME FROM ZZ_GROUP_FILE ZGF WHERE ZGF.SEND_FLG = '1'
AND ZGF.FILE_NAME||decode(nvl(ZGF.FILE_EXT,'null'),'null','','.'||ZGF.FILE_EXT) like '%'||#{query}||'%'
and (ZGF.CREATOR = #{userId} or ZGF.GROUP_ID = #{userId})
and (ZGF.GROUP_ID = #{receiverId} or ZGF.CREATOR = #{receiverId})
ORDER BY ZGF.CREATE_TIME DESC
